pageContext.description: Dimensions: L 452mm; Wsh. 40.7mm; min W. bl. 30.2; max W. bl. 34.0; max T hilt rib 7.4; L rivets 13.2 - 15.4; wt. 433.6g,Typology: milled acrosses - on slight diagonals; rivets mainly fixed by corr. and suggest elliptical handle section; rivets w. flat heads, faceted round sections.,Manufacture: cg. flash remains on hilt sides - poorly finished; many small cavities (?porosity) on hilt plate only,Condition: v. sharp edges; one significant edge dent
pageContext.surface: Fine shiny greeny-brown, speckled with dull gold colour on one face
pageContext.remarks: Labels/Markings: adhesive large rect. sepia label: '47',PIF; Rec. SN July 88; Source: BM loan
